faqSection.title: Important Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a Flat in sector 105 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get crucial information and expert answers regarding investment safety, pricing, and lifestyle in Sector 105 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes available when looking for a Flat For Sale in sector 105
faqs.answer: Sector 105 offers a broad range of flat sizes catering to various needs. The most common configurations are 2 BHK flats typically ranging from 1000 sq ft to 1250 sq ft and 3 BHK flats generally starting around 1400 sq ft and going up to 1900 sq ft. There are also premium options like luxury builder floors and penthouses which exceed these sizes, offering expansive living spaces up to 3000 sq ft or more for bespoke residences.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 a good location for long-term real estate investment appreciation
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 105 is considered an excellent location for long-term appreciation in Gurugram. Its close proximity to major expressways and developing infrastructure corridors, coupled with planned social developments like new schools and hospitals, drives demand. As connectivity to Gurgaon and Noida improves further, the capital value of a Flat For Sale in sector 105 is projected to increase steadily, offering strong returns over a 5 to 10-year horizon.

faqs.question: Are the flats in Sector 105 RERA registered and legally compliant
faqs.answer: We prioritize legal safety and transparency. All major residential projects and most individual Flat For Sale in sector 105 listings promoted through our platform are RERA registered. We verify all legal documentation, including occupancy certificates and clear land titles, before listing a property. Buyers are strongly encouraged to request RERA documentation, which our team is happy to provide for full confidence.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 105
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3 BHK flat in Sector 105 varies significantly based on the project brand, construction stage ready-to-move vs under-construction, and the specific amenities offered. Generally, the price range for a standard 3 BHK begins from approximately 75 lakhs and can go upwards of 120 lakhs for premium, fully loaded units or builder floors. Contact us for the most current price list tailored to your specific requirement.

faqs.question: How is the water and electricity supply infrastructure in this sector
faqs.answer: Sector 105 enjoys robust infrastructural planning by the local development authority. Residential projects typically have reliable 24/7 water supply from municipal sources supplemented by advanced sewage treatment plants. Electricity supply is consistent, and most modern complexes are equipped with full power backup generators, ensuring minimal disruption during outages, enhancing the living experience in your Flat For Sale in sector 105.

faqs.question: What kinds of social amenities are available near Sector 105 for families
faqs.answer: Families relocating to Sector 105 benefit from an already thriving social ecosystem. There are numerous reputed schools and educational institutions within a 15-minute drive. Major retail outlets, multiplex cinemas, and high-end shopping malls are easily accessible. Furthermore, several well-regarded hospitals and medical centers are located nearby, ensuring quick access to quality healthcare.

faqs.question: Can I get a home loan easily for a property in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Yes, securing a home loan for a Flat For Sale in sector 105 is generally straightforward, especially for RERA-registered projects. Leading national and private banks have already approved financing for properties in this sector due to its strong legal standing and developer reputation. Our team assists clients by connecting them with preferred banking partners to ensure smooth sanction and disbursement processes.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden costs associated with buying a flat here besides the unit price
faqs.answer: While the unit price is the main component, buyers must budget for mandatory additional costs. These typically include stamp duty and registration fees, goods and services tax GST if applicable, maintenance charges for the first year, internal development charges, and possibly club membership fees. We provide a detailed, itemized cost sheet before finalizing any purchase agreement to ensure full transparency.

faqs.question: How far is the nearest metro station from Sector 105 Gurugram
faqs.answer: While Sector 105 benefits from excellent road connectivity, the nearest currently operational metro station is a manageable drive away. However, future metro expansion plans aim to bring rapid transit closer to this part of Gurugram, significantly improving commuter convenience. The road network ensures that public and private transport options remain readily available for daily commuting needs.

faqs.question: What is the typical monthly maintenance charge for a standard apartment in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary depending on the complexity of amenities provided by the society. For a standard 2 BHK or 3 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 105, maintenance usually falls in the range of ₹2,500 to ₹4,500 per month. This fee covers common area electricity, lift maintenance, security services, garbage collection, and clubhouse upkeep. Luxury complexes with premium services may charge slightly higher.
